feedback_text.description:
A set of structured key feedback points. Each point should point out a specific issue and how to fix it in exec summary fashion. Each point is a bullet point on a new line. Issues only, no praise. Group and classify issues into 3 sections by severity: from **critical** to **medium** to **minor** issues. Skip a key if a certain issue group is not present at all.

After all 3 sections, add **Summary** section - A single sentence that explains what issues or groups of issues from *issues* contributed the most to the score based on rubrics. Keep it short.

score.description: A score between 1 and 5, where 1 is the worst and 5 is the best.
